ygData.subject: Disappearing characters
ygData.msgSnippet: Greetings! I was wondering if anyone was experiencing the disappearing character phenomenon. This is when another player character is right in front of you,
ygData.messageBody:
Greetings!
I was wondering if anyone was experiencing the disappearing character
phenomenon.
This is when another player character is right in front of you, then
all off a sudden they seemingly pop out of existance. Yet, they can
see your character, and soon they reappear.
I have seen one extreme case where the pc was blinking in and out. It
wasn't just myself who was experiencing this phenomena at the time,
but three other players were also having the same thing happen when
they attempted to see that one PC.
When it was reported to the bug screen, the GM had the audacity to
say that the character was Invisible. As my main is a level 47 druid,
I think I know when peeps are camo'd or such. Not to mention it's
happened while I was grouped with my husband's character and was able
to turn around and look at his monitor...easy enough to speak to him
two feet away to KNOW he's not camo.
I was curious as to whether or not the experience is exclusive to
Quellious or if people on other servers have the same thing happen.
Believe me, this is not a good thing in certain situations.
Especially if you're not grouped and need to see the other person.
(i.e. trade).
Thanks
Jessica

EternalRuby
Druid of Karana
Quellious
